verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a Redeemer,
Jesus, God's own Son,
Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
Holy One.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thank You, O my Father,
For giving us Your Son,
And leaving Your Spirit
Till the work on earth is done.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, my Redeemer,
Name above all names.
Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
Oh for sinners slain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When I stand in glory,
I will see His face,
There I'll serve my King for ever,
In that holy place.
